author: Nathaniel Fairfield
comment: There are lots of UX issues, and the graph crashed until I had at least one data file, but with a little tinkering around it works very nicely!
title: Very handy!

author: Linh Nguyen
comment: Stop working after several recording. First, it worked then when I try to record some more and when i open the file, i saw them there but nothing display on graph. When i check the folder, nothing is there
